dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S158 IS: For the relief of Dr. Shakil Afridi.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: For the relief of Dr. Shakil Afridi.

section.text: Notwithstanding title III of the Immigration and Nationality Act, or any other provision of law relating to naturalization, Dr. Shakil Afridi is deemed to be a naturalized citizen of the United States as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
